title: Skin Gallery
body: Hey Riot i would love to have a skin Gallery Feature on the league of legends store or anywhere you want it to be because i want to know exactly how many skins i have, but i check manually and sometimes it isn't accurate thank you!

replies.body: My oath this is a good idea. Maybe even a seperate list of champions with a number owned out of number there are. Ie ( annie 9/9) or something along those lines. But it would really help took me a few hours to write down my list.
Yeap haha lets keep our fingures crossed! and hope a rioter finds this

> [{quoted}](name=donger4lyfe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AWxFarix,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-18T08:24:23.194+0000)
>
> Seems quite useful +1

Quite so, it's hard to remember what I have and don't have.
Yea and it takes a long time to scroll down the skins section and sometimes it isn't even there

yeah its actually cool i would love for this to happen

AD{{champion:103}}  :3
This would be really good, I'd definitely like to keep a track of the skins I have. PLS RIOT
Who cares what skins you have ? This isnt pokemon, You dont need to catch them all..

I care because i would like to see the skins i have and yeah you don't need to " catch them all" but if you are a passionate gamer then yeah it would be nice to have a skin gallery it does not hurt :p
Seen this suggested so many times
